TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PersonalizationProvider extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class PersonalizationProvider Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: 實作個人化提供者的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality for a personalization provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是定義為個人化提供者的必要的功能的抽象基底類別。This is the abstract base class that defines the required functionality of a personalization provider. 個人化提供者載入和儲存個人化資料，代表執行個體。A personalization provider both loads and stores personalization data on behalf of a instance. 基底類別定義一些方法; 的標準的行為只有在特別處理基礎資料存放區的方法會標記為抽象的。The base class defines standard behavior for a number of methods; only those methods that specifically deal with the underlying data store are marked abstract. 這可讓開發人員撰寫自訂提供者互動的特定資料存放區中，而不必重新實作所使用的標準功能類別。This allows a developer to write a custom provider to interact with a specific data store, without needing to re-implement standard functionality used by the class.

span.para: 您可以從衍生，並提供 只有這個類別中定義的抽象方法的實作。抽象方法處理，特別是儲存及載入資料的實體資料存放區中，與資料存放區管理。自訂提供者必須能夠管理個人化資訊的方式，可區別來自資料。此外，提供者必須區隔個人化資料，由頁面以及應用程式。實作緊密結合的實作因為一些個人化提供者方法傳回的執行個體-衍生的類別。為了簡化開發自訂的提供者基底類別包含的個人化的邏輯和序列化/還原序列化邏輯，會使用直接的預設實作類別。如此一來，撰寫自訂專門用來使用不同的資料存放區提供者只需要下列的抽象方法的實作:- -這個方法只需要能夠計算中的個人化資料列數目提供的查詢參數的資料庫。 - -指定的路徑和使用者名稱，這個方法會載入兩個二進位大型物件 (Blob) 從資料庫： 一個用於共用的資料，一個用於使用者資料的 BLOB。如果您提供的使用者名稱和路徑，則您不需要控制項來存取可提供使用者名稱/路徑資訊的頁面資訊。 - -指定的路徑和使用者名稱，這個方法會刪除資料庫中對應資料列。如果您提供的使用者名稱和路徑，則您不需要控制項來存取可提供使用者名稱/路徑資訊的頁面資訊。 - -指定的路徑和使用者名稱，這個方法會將儲存所提供的 BLOB 到資料庫。如果您提供的使用者名稱和路徑，則您不需要控制項來存取可提供使用者名稱/路徑資訊的頁面資訊。在所有這些方法中，如果只有提供路徑，則表示要對頁面共用個人化資料。如果路徑以及使用者名稱傳遞至方法時，頁面的使用者個人化資料應該在發生作用。若是，應該一律載入指定的路徑的共用的資料，並選擇性地路徑的使用者個人化資料也載入如果使用者名稱不是。所有其他抽象的方法是只有在系統管理應用程式，並不會使用 Web 組件基礎結構在執行階段。如需的個人化提供者實作的範例，請參閱類別。

You can derive from and provide implementations for only the abstract methods defined in this class. The abstract methods deal specifically with saving and loading data to a physical data store, and with data store administration. A custom provider must be capable of manipulating personalization information in a manner that distinguishes data from data. Furthermore, a provider must segment personalization data by page as well as by application. Implementations of are tightly coupled to implementations of because some personalization provider methods return instances of -derived classes. To ease development of custom providers, the base class includes a default implementation of the personalization logic and serialization/deserialization logic that is used directly by the class. As a result, authoring a custom provider solely for the purpose of working with a different data store only requires implementation of the following abstract methods: - - This method needs to be able to count the number of rows of personalization data in the database for the supplied query parameters. - - Given the path and user name, this method loads two binary large objects (BLOBs) from the database: one BLOB for shared data and one for user data. If you supply the user name and path, then you do not need the control to access the page information that can provide the user name/path information. - - Given the path and user name, this method deletes the corresponding row in the database. If you supply the user name and path, then you do not need the control to access the page information that can provide the user name/path information. - - Given the path and user name, this method saves the supplied BLOB to the database. If you supply the user name and path, then you do not need the control to access the page information that can provide the user name/path information. In all of these methods, if only a path is supplied, that indicates the shared personalization data for the page is being operated upon. If both a path and a username are passed to a method, then the user personalization data for the page should be acted upon. In the case of , the shared data for the specified path should always be loaded, and optionally the user personalization data for the path should also be loaded if the username is not . All other abstract methods are intended for use only in administrative applications and are not used by the Web Parts infrastructure at run time. For an example of an implementation of a personalization provider, see the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為這是抽象類別的建構函式時，您必須覆寫這個方法，以建立繼承自這個類別的類別的執行個體。Because this is a constructor for an abstract class, you must override this method to create an instance of a class that inherits from this class.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得或設定為提供者設定的應用程式名稱。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the name of the application configured for the provider.

value.span: 為個人化提供者設定的應用程式。

span.span: The application configured for the personalization provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在組態檔中使用未指定應用程式名稱[（ASP.NET 設定結構描述） webParts 之 personalization 的 providers 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51363b49-eafa-4b9c-b9d0-80086b385195)屬性，值屬性使用。If an application name is not specified in the configuration file using the [providers Element for personalization for webParts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51363b49-eafa-4b9c-b9d0-80086b385195) attribute, the value of the property is used. > [!CAUTION] > 因為所提供的所有要求都使用單一的預設個人化提供者執行個體物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，每個嘗試設定屬性值。Because a single, default personalization provider instance is used for all the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently, each attempting to set the property value. 屬性不是安全執行緒的多個寫入，以及變更屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為，應用程式的多個使用者。The property is not thread-safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建議您避免程式碼，讓使用者設定屬性才。It is recommended that you avoid code allowing users to set the property unless required. 設定屬性可能是必要項，例如，在管理多個應用程式的個人化資料的系統管理應用程式。Setting the property might be required, for example, in an administrative application that manages personalization data for multiple applications.

summary.span: 傳回 物件清單，表示 Web 組件控制集使用的一組已知能力。

span.span: Returns a list of objects that represent the set of known capabilities used by the Web Parts control set.

returns.span: ，表示 Web 組件控制集使用的一組已知能力。

span.span: An that represents the set of known capabilities used by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前，這個方法會傳回包含兩個功能的清單：和。Currently, this method returns a list containing two capabilities: and . 這些是可以在定義的預設功能[（ASP.NET 設定結構描述） webParts 之 personalization 的 authorization 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d190d4ff-1445-4ee1-88eb-9737c7aa1434)內的項目[(ASP.NET webParts 的 personalization 項目設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3d77da55-73ce-46ce-97cf-7d2abcaada09)項目[webParts 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90af5acc-5a80-4b39-bba7-74afd06b167c)組態區段。These are the default capabilities that can be defined in the [authorization Element for personalization for webParts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d190d4ff-1445-4ee1-88eb-9737c7aa1434) element within the [personalization Element for webParts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3d77da55-73ce-46ce-97cf-7d2abcaada09) element of the[webParts Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90af5acc-5a80-4b39-bba7-74afd06b167c) configuration section. 如果您選擇實作的自訂個人化基礎結構，您可以覆寫這個方法，並定義您自己的授權相關的使用者功能集。If you choose to implement a custom personalization infrastructure, you can override this method and define your own set of authorization-related user capabilities.

summary.span: 決定初始個人化範圍應當是 還是 範圍。

span.span: Determines whether the initial personalization scope should be or scope.

returns.span: ，指出目前的個人化範圍是 還是 。

span.span: A indicating whether the current personalization scope is or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會判斷是否應為目前的領域或是，參考控制及個人化狀態已經載入從稍早在個人化生命週期中的資訊。This method determines whether the current scope should be or , given a reference to a control and the personalization state information that has already been loaded from earlier in the personalization life cycle. 這項資訊由後續的個人化相關工作的執行個體。This information is used by a instance for subsequent personalization-related tasks. 下列規則用來決定個人化範圍：The following rules are used to determine personalization scope: - 範圍一開始假設為。Scope is assumed initially to be . - 如果目前正在執行的使用者帳戶未經過驗證，則範圍會設定為。If the currently executing user account is not authenticated, the scope is set to . - 如果目前正在執行的使用者帳戶的驗證，則會在優先順序中進行其他處理：If the currently executing user account is authenticated, additional processing occurs in order of precedence: - 如果網頁為回傳模式，頁面要求就會包含來自先前呈現頁面的範圍資訊。If the page is in postback mode, the page request contains scope information from a previous rendering of the page. 如果該範圍的資訊指出使用範圍，則範圍會評估為。If that scope information indicates that scope was used, then the scope evaluates to . - 如果目前正在執行的頁面必須從另一個頁面傳送給它的控制項 (例如，如果將控制轉移的原因呼叫方法; 請注意，這個特定的檢查不會發生跨網頁公佈)，如果先前執行網頁有執行個體，範圍設定的值為`Personalization.Scope`屬性從先前執行個體。If the currently executing page had control transferred to it from another page (for example, if the transfer of control occurred due to calling the method; note that this specific check does not occur for cross-page posting), and if the previously executing page had a instance, the scope is set to the value of the `Personalization.Scope` property from the previous instance. - 如果不符合上述準則，則範圍評估為值目前的屬性控制項。If the previous criteria are not met, then the scope evaluates to the value of the property for the current control. 在進行先前的評估之後，，和範圍評估為範圍，就會發生下列處理：After the previous evaluations have been made, and if the scope evaluates to scope, the following processing occurs: - 如果目前正在執行的使用者帳戶具有功能，範圍仍然設為。If the currently executing user account has the capability, the scope remains set to . - 如果目前正在執行的使用者帳戶並沒有功能，則範圍會重設為。If the currently executing user account does not have the capability, then the scope is reset to . - 如果所有先前的範圍內評估結果為，此結果會儲存為目前正在執行的頁面上的隱藏欄位。If the result of all previous scope evaluations is , this result is stored as a hidden field on the currently executing page. 這是藉此頁面可以重新執行後續的回傳期間範圍內評估的機制。This is the mechanism whereby a page can replay the scope evaluation during subsequent postbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的預設實作會使用中的資訊[（ASP.NET 設定結構描述） webParts 之 personalization 的 authorization 項目](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d190d4ff-1445-4ee1-88eb-9737c7aa1434)內的項目[個人化項目為webParts （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3d77da55-73ce-46ce-97cf-7d2abcaada09)項目[webParts 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90af5acc-5a80-4b39-bba7-74afd06b167c)組態區段，在 Machine.config 或 Web.config 檔案以判斷使用者的授權功能。The default implementation of this method consumes the information in the [authorization Element for personalization for webParts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d190d4ff-1445-4ee1-88eb-9737c7aa1434) element within the [personalization Element for webParts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3d77da55-73ce-46ce-97cf-7d2abcaada09) element of the[webParts Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90af5acc-5a80-4b39-bba7-74afd06b167c) configuration section in the Machine.config or Web.config file to determine a user's authorized capabilities. 在字典中的功能將會隸屬所傳回的物件方法，目前包括功能和功能。The capabilities in the dictionary will be members of the object returned by the method, which currently include the capability and the capability.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，根據範圍和特定查詢參數，傳回包含零或多個 衍生物件的集合。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a collection containing zero or more -derived objects based on scope and specific query parameters.

returns.span: ，含有零或多個 衍生物件。

span.span: A containing zero or more -derived objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是查詢的個人化資料的系統管理方法的抽象定義。This method is the abstract definition of an administrative method for querying personalization data. 衍生的實作應該遵循以下所述的邏輯。Derived implementations should follow the logic described below. 傳回的項目組受到`pageIndex`並`pageSize`參數，其中`pageSize`設定要傳回的記錄數目和`pageIndex`設定要傳回的記錄。The set of returned items is constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters, where `pageSize` sets the number of records to return and `pageIndex` sets which records to return. 比方說，`pageIndex`為 0， `pageSize` 25 個會傳回前 25 個相符項目，雖然`pageIndex`為 1 和`pageSize`25 個會傳回出現 26 50。For example, a `pageIndex` of 0 and a `pageSize` of 25 would return the first 25 occurrences, while a `pageIndex` of 1 and a `pageSize` of 25 would return occurrences 26-50. 如果您想要擷取所有可用的記錄，設定`pageIndex`為 0 並`pageSize`至。If you want to retrieve all available records, set `pageIndex` to 0 and `pageSize` to . -會依字母順序傳回衍生的物件，並將其排序依據的組合他們和屬性值，同時以遞增順序。The -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order and sorted by a combination of their and property values, both in ascending order. 此方法會查詢萬用字元的字元傳遞至基礎資料存放區。This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 目前相依於每個提供者如何處理字元，例如星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 萬用字元的支援。Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，針對 SQL 相容的資料存放區，您可以執行萬用字元搜尋部分的路徑包含萬用字元，不會出現在開頭、 結尾或搜尋字串中的文字中間屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要尋找開頭為"~/vdir，「 所有路徑屬性會設定為"~/vdir%」。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". 同樣地，部分的使用者名稱的萬用字元搜尋可能會出現在任何時間點的文字字串中的萬用字元屬性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要尋找所有的使用者名稱開頭的"John"，參數會看起來像"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the parameter would look like "John%". 適用於下列的查詢條件約束：The following query constraints apply: - 如果只有`scope`提供，並`query`是`null`上的所有屬性或`query`傳回`null`或預設值，則比對所指定的所有記錄`scope`參數會傳回。If only `scope` is provided, and `query` is `null` or all the properties on `query` return either `null` or default values, then all records matching the indicated `scope` parameter are returned. - 如果屬性不是`null`，傳回的記錄也會比對的篩選根據的路徑值。If the property is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on paths that match the value. - 如果屬性不是`null`，傳回的記錄也會篩選根據的使用者名稱符合屬性值。If the property is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on user names that match the property value. - 如果屬性不等於，則傳回的記錄也會篩選為傳回與非作用中使用者相關聯的記錄。If the property is not equal to , then the returned records are also filtered to return only those records associated with inactive users. 比較包含記錄所在屬性小於或等於屬性。The comparison includes records where the property is less than or equal to the property. 請注意，這個方法不會驗證查詢參數的組合。Note that this method does not validate combinations of query parameters. 比方說，程式碼可以要求一組共用範圍中的特定使用者名稱相關聯的個人化狀態記錄。For example, code can request a set of personalization state records associated with a specific user name in the shared scope. 因為使用者名稱不是共用的資訊與相關聯，則傳回的集合會是空白。Because user names are not associated with shared information, the returned collection would be empty. 有可能會傳回空集合的參數組合包括：Parameter combinations that have the potential to return a non-empty collection include: - 結合的範圍屬性。 scope in combination with the property. - 範圍中的任何或所有的值組合， ，和屬性。 scope in combination with the values for any or all of the , , and properties.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會傳回特定範圍內存在的基礎資料存放區中的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows in the underlying data store that exist for the specified parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是抽象的定義，管理方法來擷取個人化資料的計數。This method is the abstract definition of an administrative method for retrieving counts of personalization data. 衍生的實作應該遵循以下所述的邏輯。Derived implementations should follow the logic described below. 此方法會查詢萬用字元的字元傳遞至基礎資料存放區。This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 目前相依於每個提供者如何處理字元，例如星號 （\*）、 百分比符號 （%） 或底線 (_) 萬用字元的支援。Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 一般來說，針對 SQL 相容的資料存放區，您可以執行萬用字元搜尋部分的路徑包含萬用字元，不會出現在開頭、 結尾或搜尋字串中的文字中間屬性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要尋找開頭為"~/vdir，「 所有路徑屬性會設定為"~/vdir%」。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". 同樣地，部分的使用者名稱的萬用字元搜尋可能會出現在任何時間點的文字字串中的萬用字元屬性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要尋找所有的使用者名稱開頭的"John"，參數會看起來像"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the parameter would look like "John%". 適用於下列的查詢條件約束：The following query constraints apply: - 如果只有`scope`提供，並`query`是`null`上的所有屬性或`query`傳回`null`或預設值，則比對所指定的所有記錄`scope`參數會計算。If only `scope` is provided, and `query` is `null` or all the properties on `query` return either `null` or default values, then all records matching the indicated `scope` parameter are counted. - 如果屬性不是`null`的計數的記錄也會比對的篩選根據的路徑值。If the property is not `null`, the counted records are also filtered based on paths that match the value. - 如果屬性不是`null`的計數的記錄也會篩選根據的使用者名稱符合屬性值。If the property is not `null`, the counted records are also filtered based on user names that match the property value. - 如果屬性不等於，然後計算的記錄也會篩選為傳回與非作用中使用者相關聯的記錄。If the property is not equal to , then the counted records are also filtered to return only those records associated with inactive users. 比較包含記錄所在屬性小於或等於屬性。The comparison includes records where the property is less than or equal to the property. 請注意，這個方法不會驗證查詢參數的組合。Note that this method does not validate combinations of query parameters. 比方說，程式碼可以要求在共用的範圍內的特定使用者名稱與相關聯的個人化狀態記錄的計數。For example, code can request a count of personalization state records associated with a specific user name in the shared scope. 使用者名稱不是共用的資訊與相關聯的因為傳回的計數會是零。Because user names are not associated with shared information, the returned count would be zero. 有可能會傳回非零計數的參數組合包括：Parameter combinations that have the potential to return a non-zero count include: - 結合的範圍屬性。 scope in combination with the property. - 範圍中的任何或所有的值組合， ，和屬性。 scope in combination with the values for any or all of the , , and properties.

abstract member LoadPersonalizationBlobs : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager * string * string * * -> unit

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會載入基礎資料存放區中未經處理的個人化資料。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, loads raw personalization data from the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自類別並實作這個方法應該使用`webPartManager`， `path`，和`username`參數做為擷取索引鍵。Classes that derive from and implement this method should use the `webPartManager`, `path`, and `username` parameters as retrieval keys. 不論資料的方式儲存在資料存放區 （某些資料存放區可能會執行某種類型的智慧型存放裝置），必須傳回資料的個人化成為組封裝的兩個陣列中的位元組。Regardless of how the data is stored in the data store (some data stores might perform some type of intelligent storage), the personalization data must be returned as a packed set of bytes in two arrays. 傳回的資料必須符合下列規則：The returned data must conform to the following rules: - 資料範圍必須一律會傳回在`sharedDataBlob`參數。The data for the scope must always be returned in the `sharedDataBlob` parameter. - 根據索引鍵值中傳回資料`userDataBlob`參數。Depending on the key values, data is returned in the `userDataBlob` parameter. 為非`null`值`userName`參數會指示也應該擷取資料。A non-`null` value for the `userName` parameter indicates that data should also be retrieved. 個人化提供者衍生自並實作這個方法可以最佳化其資料存放區之間的互動擷取所有的個人化資料，在一個往返，而不是擷取和中兩個資料分隔來回行程。A personalization provider that derives from and implements this method can optimize interactions with its data store by retrieving all personalization data in one round trip, as opposed to retrieving and data in two separate round trips.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法時所使用的主要進入點載入個人化資料的類別。This method is the main entry point used by the class to load personalization data. 預設實作會從基礎資料存放區載入未經處理資料 （功能在衍生的提供者中實作），然後將轉換成的未經處理資料執行個體。The default implementation loads the raw data from the underlying data store (functionality is implemented in derived providers) and then converts the raw data into a instance. 如果`ignoreCurrentUser`參數是`true`，沒有使用者名稱傳遞給方法。If the `ignoreCurrentUser` parameter is `true`, no user name is passed to the method. 個人化提供者可以選擇將此內容解譯成有意義的唯一的個人化狀態與範圍應該從基礎資料存放區中擷取。A personalization provider can choose to interpret this as meaning that only personalization state with a scope should be retrieved from the underlying data store. 當方法正在執行時，它會呼叫方法，而且有三種類型的狀態是正在載入可能會發生的還原序列化錯誤。When the method is executing, it calls the method, and there are three types of deserialization errors that can occur as the state is being loaded. 當這些特定的錯誤發生時，擲回任何例外狀況，而改為 [健康情況監視] 功能所記錄的錯誤事件 (如需健全狀況監視，以及存取它所建立的記錄資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 健康監視概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e003f224-70fe-4cd8-a71a-2dc81e2d7e4c)).When these specific errors occur, no exception is thrown, and the error events are logged instead by the Health Monitoring feature (for information on health monitoring and accessing the logs created by it, see [ASP.NET Health Monitoring Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e003f224-70fe-4cd8-a71a-2dc81e2d7e4c)). 下列的三種案例會讓還原序列化錯誤事件寫入記錄檔：The following three scenarios cause deserialization error events to be written to the log: - 還原序列化會使用字串的屬性類型的失敗的嘗試。A failed attempt to deserialize a property type that uses a string . - 若要還原序列化使用二進位序列化的屬性類型的失敗的嘗試。A failed attempt to deserialize a property type that uses binary serialization. - 若要還原序列化的屬性類型，因為無法建立類型的執行個體嘗試失敗。A failed attempt to deserialize a property type because an instance of the type cannot be created.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, deletes raw personalization data from the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自類別並實作這個方法應該使用`webPartManager`， `path`，和`userName`參數做為儲存體金鑰。Classes that derive from and implement this method should use the `webPartManager`, `path`, and `userName` parameters as storage keys. 衍生的實作必須修改資料存放區，以便提供的儲存體金鑰的個人化資料實際上會被刪除。Derived implementations must modify the data store so that personalization data for supplied storage keys is effectively deleted. 這是由衍生的實作，決定如何它們實際完成這項作業。It is up to the derived implementations as to how they physically accomplish this. 在衍生的個人化提供者必須能夠區分每個頁面為基礎的個人化資料。The derived personalization provider must be able to distinguish personalization data on a per-page basis. 此外，針對指定的頁面狀態，個人化提供者必須能夠區分和範圍資料。Furthermore, for a given page's state, the personalization provider must be able to distinguish between and scope data. 如果為非`null`提供使用者名稱，則重設作業套用至範圍; 否則重設作業適用於範圍。If a non-`null` user name is provided, then the reset operation applies to the scope; otherwise, the reset operation applies to the scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是刪除個人化資料的系統管理方法的抽象定義。This method is the abstract definition of an administrative method for deleting personalization data. 衍生的實作應該遵循以下所述的邏輯。Derived implementations should follow the logic described below. 這個方法不支援任何萬用字元搜尋。No wildcard character searches are supported by this method. 如果個人化提供者會公開交易感知的資料存放區的資料，這個方法應該視為單一不可部分完成交易來執行其作業。If the personalization provider exposes data from a transaction-aware data store, this method should perform its operations as a single atomic transaction. 允許參數的下列組合：Only the following combinations of parameters are allowed: - `scope`參數設定，而所有其他參數會設定為`null`。The `scope` parameter is set, and all other parameters are set to `null`. 這個組合會刪除所指定的個人化範圍相關聯的所有 Web 組件個人化資料`scope`。This combination deletes all Web Parts personalization data associated with the personalization scope indicated by `scope`. - `scope`參數設定，而`paths`參數包含至少一個值。The `scope` parameter is set, and the `paths` parameter contains at least one value. 這個組合會刪除指定的路徑或路徑所指定的個人化範圍中的所有 Web 組件個人化資料`scope`。This combination deletes all Web Parts personalization data for the specified path or paths in the personalization scope indicated by `scope`. - `scope`參數設定為，則`paths`參數會設定，且包含只有一個值，而`usernames`參數包含至少一個值。The `scope` parameter is set to , the `paths` parameter is set and contains only one value, and the `usernames` parameter contains at least one value. 這個組合會刪除所有的使用者個人化 Web 組件中所包含的使用者相關聯的指定路徑的資料`usernames`。This combination deletes all user personalization Web Parts data for the given path that is associated with the user or users contained in `usernames`. - `scope`參數設定為，則`paths`參數設為`null`，和`usernames`參數包含至少一個值。The `scope` parameter is set to , the `paths` parameter is set to `null`, and the `usernames` parameter contains at least one value. 這個組合會刪除所有的每一使用者個人化 Web 組件的資料，在中所包含的使用者相關聯的所有路徑之間`usernames`。This combination deletes all per-user personalization Web Parts data, across all paths, associated with the user or users contained in `usernames`. 任何其他的參數值組合無效，而且將會擲回例外狀況。Any other combination of parameter values is invalid and will throw an exception. 具體而言，不允許下列兩種組合：Specifically, the following two combinations are not allowed: - `usernames`不能提供參數時`scope`設定為。The `usernames` parameter cannot be provided when `scope` is set to . - `paths`參數不能包含多個項目時`usernames`參數不是`null`。The `paths` parameter cannot contain more than one entry when the `usernames` parameter is not `null`. 任何`paths`和`usernames`包含於各自陣列的參數值必須符合以下驗證規則。Any `paths` and `usernames` parameter values contained within the respective arrays must meet the following validation rules. 如果任何驗證規則失敗時的參數陣列中，任何成員擲回例外狀況。If any validation rules fail for any member of the parameter arrays, an exception is thrown. 驗證規則如下：The validation rules are: - `null` 不允許值。`null` values are not allowed. - 空字串 ("") 不允許。An empty string ("") is not allowed. 參數應該修剪之前執行的檢查，空字串。Parameters should be trimmed prior to performing an empty string check. - `usernames`參數不能包含逗號 （，）。The `usernames` parameter cannot contain commas (,). - 長度`paths`參數不能大於 256 個字元的 SQL database。The length of the `paths` parameter cannot be greater than 256 characters for a SQL database. - 長度`usernames`參數不能大於 256 個字元的 SQL database。The length of the `usernames` parameter cannot be greater than 256 characters for a SQL database.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會根據指定的參數，刪除基礎資料存放區中的 Web 組件個人化資料。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, deletes Web Parts personalization data from the underlying data store based on the specified parameters.

returns.span: 從基礎資料存放區刪除的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows deleted from the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是刪除個人化資料的系統管理方法的抽象定義。This method is the abstract definition of an administrative method for deleting personalization data. 請注意，這個方法只會影響使用者的個人化資料和不共用的資料。Note that this method affects only user personalization data, and not shared data. 衍生的實作應該遵循以下所述的邏輯：Derived implementations should follow the logic described below: - `path`參數不能包含萬用字元。The `path` parameter cannot contain wildcard characters. - 如果提供者會公開交易感知的資料存放區的資料，這個方法應在單一不可部分完成交易中執行其作業。If the provider exposes data from a transaction-aware data store, this method should perform its operations in a single atomic transaction. - 如果`path`參數為非`null`，然後與相關聯的唯一的每一使用者個人化資料錄`path`將被刪除。If the `path` parameter is non-`null`, then only per-user personalization records associated with `path` will be deleted. - 只有每位使用者個人化資料錄會被視為非使用中所示的日期後的使用者相關聯`userInactiveSinceDate`參數會被刪除。Only per-user personalization records associated with users that are considered inactive since the date indicated in the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter will be deleted. 具體來說，記錄小於或等於會被刪除。Specifically, records where is less than or equal to are deleted. - 如果未提供這兩個參數，則會刪除符合這兩個條件約束的記錄。If both parameters are provided, then records that match both constraints are deleted. - `path`參數可以是`null`。The `path` parameter can be `null`. - `path`參數不可以是空的字串。The `path` parameter cannot be an empty string. 它應該修剪之前執行這項檢查。It should be trimmed prior to performing this check. - 屬性不能是 `null`。The property cannot be `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract void SavePersonalizationBlob (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager webPartManager, string path, string userName, byte[] dataBlob);

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void SavePersonalizationBlob(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager webPartManager, string path, string userName, unsigned int8[] dataBlob) cil managed

protected: abstract void SavePersonalizationBlob(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartManager ^ webPartManager, System::String ^ path, System::String ^ userName, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ dataBlob);
abstract member SavePersonalizationBlob : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager * string * string * byte[] -> unit

span.span: The managing the personalization data.

param.name: path
param.span: 用做資料存放區金鑰之個人化資訊的路徑。

span.span: The path for personalization information to be used as the data store key.

param.name: userName
param.span: 用做金鑰之個人化資訊的使用者名稱。

span.span: The user name for personalization information to be used as the key.

param.name: dataBlob
param.span: 要儲存的資料位元組陣列。

span.span: The byte array of data to be saved.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會將未經處理的個人化資料儲存至基礎資料存放區。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, saves raw personalization data to the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是方法的將未經處理的個人化資料儲存至基礎資料存放區所使用的抽象定義。This method is the abstract definition of the method used for saving raw personalization data to the underlying data store. 在衍生的實作應該使用`webPartManager`， `path`，和`userName`參數做為儲存體金鑰。Derived implementations should use the `webPartManager`, `path`, and `userName` parameters as storage keys. 在衍生的個人化提供者必須能夠區分每個頁面為基礎的個人化資料。The derived personalization provider must be able to distinguish personalization data on a per-page basis. 此外，針對指定的頁面狀態，提供者必須能夠區分和範圍。Furthermore, for a given page's state, the provider must be able to distinguish between and scope. 如果非`null`提供使用者名稱，則`dataBlob`參數處於範圍; 否則`dataBlob`參數會假設為在範圍。If a non-`null` user name is provided, then the `dataBlob` parameter is in scope; otherwise, the `dataBlob` parameter is assumed to be in scope.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SavePersonalizationState (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState state);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SavePersonalizationState(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState state) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub SavePersonalizationState (state As PersonalizationState)

abstract member SavePersonalizationState : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState -> unit override this.SavePersonalizationState : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState -> unit

span.span: A containing personalization data to be saved.

summary.span: 將個人化資料儲存至資料存放區。

span.span: Saves personalization data to a data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法時所使用的主要進入點類別來儲存個人化資料。This method is the main entry point used by the class to save personalization data. 這個方法的預設實作會使用的內部實作的方法封裝的個人化資料的位元組陣列。The default implementation of this method uses the methods of an internal implementation of to pack personalization data into a byte array. 如果此封裝的結果建立空的位元組陣列 （因為任何個人化資料，造成屬性擷取），預設實作會呼叫方法。If the results of this packing create an empty byte array (because property extraction resulted in no personalization data), the default implementation calls the method. 否則，預設實作會呼叫方法。Otherwise, the default implementation calls the method.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 儲存的 物件與 方法傳回的 物件型別不同。

span.span: The object being saved has a different type from the object that was returned by the method.
